summary: Provides a collection of generic helper classes and functions used throughout the Git object model, including stream adapters for subprocess handling, base classes for serializable objects, generic traversable structures for graph walks, utilities for timezone offsets, and assorted parsers and converters.
business_intent: Enable the core Git library to reliably persist, reconstruct, and navigate version-control objects while handling process I/O and timezone calculations, thereby supporting higher-level Git operations such as commits, trees, and submodule management.
